transcript:
Customer: Prabhu Nandan Raghav Ram Hare
Halo
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Haan sir phone disconnect ho kar diya tha bataiye main ye main ye main to bola hold karo aap
Customer: Sir maine hold kiya tha pata nahi shayad aapne disconnect kar diya tha isliye fir maine kaha thoda rok ke phone lagaun koi baat nahi haan haan sir main ye keh raha tha ki agar aap jo category mein jaise maan lijiye koi bhi category mein jo aap lead lena matlab koi bhi category mein agar preferred leader loge to usme to us particular category ki leads to badhengi.
Executive: Nahi badhti na aap check karo.
Customer: Kitni badhti hai batao.
Executive: Nahi nahi.
Customer: 21 by lead badhengi har hafte ki agar ek category ko leke to.
Executive: To 20 21 mein to hona kya hai.
Customer: Ye to main bol raha hun aapko.
Executive: 20 21 ka to har hafte har hafte ki valid badhegi na.
Customer: Abhi 100 ko matlab 20% to badh rahi hai bhai aap samjho baat ko.
Executive: But sir main but usse bhi to aap samjho meri baat ko practically aap thoda practical way mein dekho bhai isme aap traffic badha doge maan lo ab usme kai guna badhaoge hai na to 200% badha doge 300% badh jayega to us hisab se wo us traffic badhega to uske liye bhi chahiye apne ko by lead jyada to wo aapko kaam nahi karega wahi to main mere ko malum hai na pehle bhi aise kuch hua tha to matlab kam hi milti hai koi khas matlab mere ko lag raha tha utni hi milegi lekin chalo aap bata rahe ho ki
Customer: Nahi nahi definitely sir har har hafte har hafte 21 by lead badh jayegi aur usse usse usse ek cheez ka fayda kya hoga meri baat suno us traffic ko cater karne ke liye samajh rahe hain meri baat ko har jo waha par visibility padegi to jaruri thodi hai ki har koi inquiry post karega.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: To sir main wahi to main wahi to keh raha hun sir kuch cheeze to direct call aur inquiry ke through bhi badh jayengi aur rahi baat by lead ki jo by lead aap consume kar rahe ho usme aapko jo har hafte 21 by lead to definitely uska ek tarah se badhkar hi milega aapko jo abhi jo chal raha hai usse to badhkar hi milega.
Executive: Nahi nahi main aap aap puri baat ke scenario ko samjho na bhai jaise aap jab traffic badhaoge usme kai guna.
Customer: Haan samjhe na baat ko jab traffic kai guna badhega to us hisab se visibility badhegi visibility badhegi to waha par ab wo badh jayega na jaise buyer view view catalog view wagera.
Executive: Sir catalog dekhiye meri baat samjhiyega catalog badhega aap jo bol rahe ho na jaruri nahi ki har koi waha inquiry post kar dega wo.
Customer: Nahi main main samajh gaya aapki baat seedhi si baat hai jab aap apna package ko update upgrade karoge to seedhi seedhi baat hai aapki visibility up hogi to number of catalog views aur wo sari cheeze bhi badh jayengi aap yahi na kehna chah rahe ho.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan to main wo main wahi cheez keh raha hun sir jaise maan lijiye abhi jo aapke paas hai usse to by lead aapke paas bach hi nahi rahi hai theek hai but abhi aap agar ye loge na to number of by leads ka ek section to badhega hi badhega sath mein jo calls aur inquiry ka jo flow abhi kam hai thoda jo kam hai matlab mera ek agar main us preferred leader se aur abhi ke leader se compare karu to abhi jo kam hai wo gap fulfill ho jayega to kahin na kahin theek hai kuch kuch cheeze compensate hongi hamari lekin kuch cheeze hamare liye add on bhi hongi ki hamara calls aur inquiry ka flow bhi badh jayega.
Executive: Ye bhi to ek ye bhi to ek point hai na sir aap apne aap ko dekho koi baat hai na ab apne hisab se aap khali apne angle soch rahe ho aap jo main bol raha hun aap usko thoda gehan tarike se sochne ki koshish nahi kar rahe ho na main main samajh raha hun sir aap jo cheeze keh rahe ho dekho aap batao mere ko kya bola kitne bhi view aa jayega to jaruri nahi ki wo view wala inquiry post karega ya call karega maan lo hum nahi bol rahe ki bhai har koi waha par kar dega.
Customer: Lekin jab wo hum us buyer ko catch kaise karenge.
Executive: Aisa hai kya ki koi jo aaya aur har koi inquiry post kar dega ya call kar dega hai na to mera kehne ka matlab wahi hai ki jab tak ye badhega nahi number kam se kam do teen guna usi hisab se badhega nahi lead ka to koi matlab nahi hai na fir wo kaam nahi aayega.
Customer: Sir dekhiye by leads ko lekar ke main to aapse wahi keh raha tha ki dekho by leads to dekho hamare apne end se hota hai aur catalog view bhi hum jo consume karte hain apne level pe dekh kar ke hi karte hain theek hai main maan raha hun by leads abhi jo padh rahi hai wo kam padh rahi hai lekin matlab agar hum ek matlab ek bade picture ke point of view mein agar hum dekhe to aap aapko aapko bhi itna idea hai sir ki jo response aur jo conversion hai wo calls aur inquiry se jyada hai aapko theek hai na bhai humko to jo aaya humko us har us vyakti ko pakadna hai jo apne mein aage jayega yaha par haan haan definitely paisa hai hum kis naam ka de rahe hain batao aap mere ko agar hum usko maan lo contact nahi kar payenge to kya matlab niklega fir se itna paisa liya aapne wo aage chala bhi gaya visibility ke karan se aur hum usse kuch kar hi bhi nahi paye to number of abhi jo isme jo 21 lead har 21 lead har hafte jo badhengi wo wo aapko agar kam padh rahi hai to isse upar jo pack hota hai agar maan lijiye industry leader wala jo hota hai uspe bhi ja sakte hain.
Executive: Nahi wo aisa nahi hota na bhai ye to kehne ka matlab kuch alag se jaise by lead ke liye alag se dena chahiye ki bhaiya har leader wala hai ya industry leader hai jo bhi hai third wala inko maan lo kam pad rahi hai to inko bhai usi ratio mein apne ko wo milna chahiye matlab bhai chalo ye payment karke by lead apna le sakta hai.
Customer: Sir agar aap main mera mera ek hi suggestion tha isme sir ki jaise agar maan lijiye wedding card printing machine hai aapka theek hai is wale particular category ke liye hum logo ne pehle bhi bahut discussion kiya hua hai hai na aapko matlab batane ki jarurat to hai nahi but main itna assure kar sakta hun ki is particular category mein agar aap loge na to definitely sir by leads to chalo dusri cheez hai by lead to ye hai ki aapne apne end se kiya catalog view bhi aaya to aapko aapko har aadmi ko pakadna hai wo aapki sari baat theek hai but ye bhi hai na sir ki waha se wo cheez compensate ho jayegi agar maan lijiye aap 21 ki 21 by lead bhi consume kar lijiye kare bhai waha par nahi nahi meri meri cheez samjhiyega sir jaise maan lijiye use kare hum to bolenge ki hamare paas to utna milna chahiye unlimited milna chahiye main kehta hun catalog view unlimited kar de catalog view ko unlimited kar de jo bhi aayega aap sabko dekh sakte ho wo kar sakte ho hamare panel pe nahi nahi sir aisa karega tab tab to nahi nahi aap samjho baat ko bhai aisa lagayenge aur samne tamasha dekhte rahenge wo state to ho raha hai na kaam wo ho jayega nahi nahi sir tab main aapko wahi cheez samjhana chah raha tha dekhiye jiye maan lijiye agar jitni bhi leads aapko abhi is time pe mil rahi hai theek hai aur jo abhi jo extra jo thodi bahut jo badhengi wo to rahengi rahengi theek hai but jo abhi jo flow hai inquiries aur call ka wo bhi to increase hoga na sir to kahin na kahin waha se bhi to agar aapko jo direct calls aur inquiry jo aayengi uska to koi charge to hota nahi hai main kya bol raha hun usko chhodo na bhai jo direct inquiry aayegi hum to uski baat hi nahi kar raha hun main to bolunga aapko aap samjho na jab traffic badhega to har cheez badhegi na inquiry call badhni padegi aur hamara matlab jab traffic badhega to inquiry call ko chhod do aap baki jo hamara view hai catalog view wagera wo sab badhega na sab kuch badhega wo jyada matra mein badhega balki aap samjho baat ko traffic inquiry ke mukable wo jyada badhega ek baar kyuki kya hota hai na har aadmi ko jaruri nahi ki usko bilkul inquiry post kar hi dega waha par haan hmm baki bhai aap log ki marzi bhai ab aap log apne hisab se jo aapka hai formula aap to uski baat karoge nahi nahi sir dekho formula wali baat nahi hai aur kya to batao na matlab bhai wahi to ho gaya na are matlab itna paisa lagaun bhi fir uske baad bhi hum talapte rahe matlab dekhte rahe ki bas nahi wo wo dekho main aapko itna bata raha hun kyuki bol bhi isliye raha hun sir kyuki mera gold samjho baat ko waha par aap unlimited hona chahiye catalog kyuki sabse jyada sab primarily wahi badhne wala hai aap samjho baat ko bhai koi dusra brand dekh raha hai kuch kar raha hai wo jayega hai na aage badh jayega theek hai lekin waha par hamari visibility badhi wo sab cheez mein jata jayega aap logo ne sab usko lock kar diya catalog view ko to wo unlimited karo to normal bhaiya de rahe hain wo apni jagah hai sir dekho calls aur inquiry to ek tarike se unlimited hai hi hai but waha catalog view jo hota hai sir wo kya dekh rahe ho aap unlimited unlimited wala usme to unlimited unlimited kar sakte ho nahi nahi sir kai log matlab agar company apne end pe chahe to wo bhi number of call kar sakte nahi hoti nahi hai but karna chahe company to wo cheez bhi kar sakti hai but wo kar hi nahi hai kabhi company wo cheez karte lekin main wahi cheez kehna chah raha hun sir jaise ki agar to aage dekho darwaza dekho bhi limited milegi are nahi nahi nahi sir but ha ye hai ki jo apna catalog view hai meri baat ko bahut dhyan se samjho aap apne angle se khali mat socho hai na nahi aapke angle se samajh raha hun sir nahi nahi main samajh raha hun sir aapke baat bilkul theek hai seedhi si baat hai aapki visibility badhegi to catalog view bhi increase hoga aur abhi jab jab aapko abhi jab aapko abhi kam padh rahi hai lead to aage chal ke to aur lead kam padengi yahi na kehna chah rahe ho wahi bol raha hun main to main wo main wo main wo keh raha hun khali hamara leading supplier ka tag dekh ke koi aadmi inquiry post kar dega waha par haan main main bilkul samajh raha hun sir main bilkul samajh raha hun lekin agar agar hum isme maan lijiye unki abhi maan lijiye abhi jo lead kam padh rahi hai theek hai abhi jo ye increase ho jayengi jo jo 21 jo main bata raha hun aapko theek hai ye increase ho solid bhi to nahi hai abhi solid abhi abhi aap acha mujhe ek baat bataiye abhi lagbhag kitni kam kitni kitni by lead kam padh rahi hai agar ek on on an approx agar to batao haan nahi samjhe baat ko abhi jab abhi hum wo cheez to testing mode pe jaise maan lo abhi badha flow badha kiska jaise aap log ke yaha se koi promotion wagera kuch kiye maan lo jo bhi hai aur maan lo catalog view badh gaya to catalog view jaise abhi badha achanak ab badhaya to hum dekh rahe hain ye to sarpat ek dam se nipat raha hai mamla haan bilkul sahi baat hai to fir wo wo cheez bol raha hun main to wo har to ye to abhi do teen din mein khatam ho jayegi hafte mein haan bilkul ho jayegi sir aapka to pura wo chal hi raha hai na system aap dekho zara abhi ka khol ke zara abhi aap aapko dikh jayega main khol ke main khol ke baitha hua hun padi hui hai haan haan catalog bhi padi hui hai aapke paas to fir kaise banega batao abhi iska wahi ek hai sir main jo cheez aapko samjha raha tha na aap jo bol rahe ho aap apni jagah to bhi waha ka policy ka mere ko uske bare mein koi humko discussion nahi karna main aapko bol raha hun hamara jo query aap samajh gaye na baat ko bhai aap by lead aap jaise direct direct by lead ko aap bhai theek hai 70 de rahe ho 93 de rahe ho jo bhi hai ya 100 10 20 extra doge wo theek hai ye view wala jo hai na ye unlimited karenge nahi to ye pura policy fail hai fir ye bhai kyuki sabse jyada traffic badhega traffic badhega to view badhega to usko kaise hum band karenge usme bhi limitation aap laga doge itna paisa lene ke baad bhi kya matlab nikalta hai fir ab batao sir jo hai wo cheez jo cheez hai wo maine aapko batai hai baki ek bar aap jo bol rahe ho sahi bol rahe ho aap apne senior ko bolo na waha upar tak baat pahunchao bolna bhaiya ye jo bol raha hai bol raha hai ek bar discuss kar lenge sir aap kehte to ek bar kar lenge aap log bilkul discussion kar lo aap main kar leta hun discussion mera baat samajh gaye na aap jo bol raha hun main main main aapki baat samajh gaya sir but mera jo jo mera jo aapka kehna tha na are aap bol rahe ho sab theek hai aapka kehne ka matlab wo call badh jayegi ye badh jayega by lead bhi to badh jayegi percent mein badhaoge na to aap usko percent mein catalog view hi jyada badhne wala hai aapko bata du main haan wo definitely badhega sir main mana kab kar raha hun haan bas to uske liye hum kaise karenge unko to abhi pujega hi nahi aapko 10 20 extra dene se acha kyuki aap aap samjho na baat ko abhi leader hai 20 city mein promotion chal raha hai haan theek hai haan jab wo 100 150 kitne bhi bol rahe the na aap log kitne mein ho jayega wo jo bhi jitna bata rahe the aap aur aur dinon din aur badhta jayega wo haan definitely sir dekho sari cheeze badhengi wo ek tarike se sari cheeze badhengi abhi hai to fir kaise banega kaam bhi to main wahi cheez keh raha hun na sir jaise agar wo abhi filhal kya hai na calls aur inquiry pe hamara is tarike se hum apne aap ko restrict kar rahe hain but hum usme hum itna acha kar le jayenge ki ha theek hai maan lijiye agar hum yaha pe congestion apne isme ho jayega aapka guest ho jayega wo sab kintu wo wala condition nahi hona chahiye na bhai aap samjho baat ko main jo aapko bolna chah raha hun na bhai hum itna ek bar ek bar mile ek bar chalo main baat karke dekh leta hun sir ek bar baat kar leta hun agar koi aur best hai unko bolna bhaiya ye aisa aisa hai aur ye cheez bol raha hai customer hai na theek hai main ek bar baat kar leta hun tera concern to samajh hi gaya na jo main bataya aapko risk kya hun haan haan main samajh gaya sir main aapki baat samajh gaya bas bas but but uska uska wo ek hi nivaran wahi hai baki ek bar main aur baat ek bar ek bar baat kar lenge hamara jo kaam hai hum to apni cheez ko batayenge na theek hai theek hai sir main ek bar baat kar leta hun baat karke aapko confirm kar dunga theek hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants more buyleads in preferred category.

- Current number of buyleads is insufficient.

- Catalog views are limited.



Resolution:

- Executive explained benefits of preferred leads.

- Executive suggested upgrading to industry leader pack.

- Executive will discuss the catalog view limitation.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss the catalog view limitation.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog view, subscription, upgrade
